subject: clutch pedal not working
description_text: Clutch pedal not working. Workied few times after hitting the reset button and now no able to make it work

conversations.body_text: Hi yousifahmed321@outlook. com,   Could you please provide your order number and let me know which pedal model you are using? Please record a short video showing the software test, then send me the Google Drive link and make sure the access permission is set so that I can view it and help you analyze the issue.

Plus x

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

https://drive.google.com/file/d/11mwI5T2Mq5qIH5A9tzqoART2PIQJ5tXB/view?usp=drivesdk



Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi yousifahmed321@outlook. com,    Please click the “Offset” button in the software to reset the initial signal percentage, then perform the calibration again.  If the clutch still shows no signal, try swapping the clutch and throttle connectors to determine whether the issue is with the clutch control port or the clutch sensor.  Also, please check whether the black spring clip on the blue clutch limiter accessory is damaged.

Offset and calibration done
Tried swapping brake with clutch and the clutch showed signal

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi yousifahmed321@outlook. com,    After connecting the clutch to the brake port, there was no signal detected on the brake channel?

No

Hi yousifahmed321@outlook. com,     Has the clutch spring been installed? Could you take a photo so I can check it?  After installation, connect all three pedals to the control box, then unplug and reconnect the control box USB once. In the software, click Offset to reset the pedals’ initial white signal to 0%, and then recalibrate for testing.  If the issue persists, try swapping the clutch and throttle connections to determine whether the problem lies with the clutch or the throttle.

Was missing the spring, now ok Thank you.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
